mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t1.train_code as train_code,t1.name as start_name,t2.name as end_name,t1.in_time as start_time,t2.in_time as end_time,t1.index as start_NO,t2.index as end_NO FROM daily_train_station AS t1 INNER JOIN daily_train_station AS t2 ON t1.train_code = t2.train_code where t1.name=#{name1} AND t2.name=#{name2} AND t1.index < t2.index AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{sd},'%Y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(t2.date,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{en},'%Y%m%d');

SELECT DISTINCT t1.train_code as train_code,t1.name as start_name,t2.name as end_name,min(t1.in_time) as start_time,t2.in_time as end_time,t1.index as start_NO,t2.index as end_NO FROM daily_train_station AS t1 INNER JOIN daily_train_station AS t2 ON t1.train_code = t2.train_code where t1.name=#{name1} AND t2.name=#{name2} AND t1.index < t2.index AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.in_time,'%H:%i:%S') >=#{sd} and DATE_FORMAT(t2.date,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{en},'%Y%m%d');
select name from daily_train_station where daily_train_station.train_code=#{traincode} and daily_train_station.index=#{no}
select train_code, `index`, name, in_time, out_time from daily_train_station where daily_train_station.train_code = #{traincode} order by daily_train_station.index
